1.0.name: wordpress/zenlite
1.0.description: A minimalistic single column design with a widget-ready horizontal navigation menu for listing Pages, Categories or a custom menu. Includes additional templates for archives, categories, author lists, pages without comments, images, attachments and search results. Thickbox enabled image template. Customisable header and background images. Post format support. Additional theme options. Translation-ready and child-theme friendly. Support available at http://forum.quirm.net/
